Package model.enemies

Class EnemyBoss

java.lang.Object
java.util.Observable
model.game.Entity
model.enemies.Enemy
model.enemies.EnemyMighta
model.enemies.EnemyBoss
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class EnemyBoss extends EnemyMighta
Class for enemy kind BOSS, similar to Enemy Mighta but can't be trapped in a bubble and his life points decreases every time a bubble hits him.

  • Field Summary

    Runs the thread of EnemyBoss, to decide when to follow player, how much time before disappearing after death, and how much time to stay hurt when hitted.

  • Constructor Details

    • EnemyBoss

      public EnemyBoss(int x, int y)
      Creates a new EnemyBoss with Life points, faster and with damage points every time he's hitted. Gives VALUE points when killed.
      Parameters:
      x - width position
      y - height position

  • Method Details

    • updatePosition

      public void updatePosition()
      Updates enemy position based on direction, collision and status.
      Overrides:
      updatePosition in class EnemyMighta

    • playerCollision

      public boolean playerCollision()
      Detects if a collision with the player has happened.
      Returns:
      true is collision has happened, else false.

    • setHitted

      public void setHitted(boolean hitted)
      When he's hitted by a bubble, "damage" is subtracted from lifePoints, and hitTime is updated with current time, also "hurt" is set on true to control action in Thread.
      Overrides:
      setHitted in class Entity

    • run

      public void run()
      Runs the thread of EnemyBoss, to decide when to follow player, how much time before disappearing after death, and how much time to stay hurt when hitted. A random number 0/100 is given to randomize some actions.
      Specified by:
      run in interface Runnable
      Overrides:
      run in class EnemyMighta

    • getHP

      public int getHP()
